name: Μίασμα
description:
The game wants to combine meditation and spiritual purification with chemistry through an experience that stimulates the player with images, sounds and citations, but at the same time enjoyable to play.

The journey of purification of the molecule is comparable to the cognitive one of man useful to purify himself from the miasma. The molecule has to free the mixture in which it is immersed from impurities, just as man must free himself from what contaminates his spirit.
